'''Johan Berntsson''' is the game designer of [[Hobbit - The True Story]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/hobbit-true.html Hobbit - The True Story] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 17 March 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.mobygames.com/game/hobbit-the-true-story Hobbit - The True Story] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 17 March 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.faqs.org/faqs/tolkien/games/ FAQs, List of computer games and MUDs with a Tolkien theme] (retrieved 17 March 2011)</ref>
